caption:
This photograph captures a man seated in the cabin of an old, weathered truck, gazing directly at the camera with a subtle smile. The truck's door is open, and through its window, a reflection of two people sitting on a roadside guardrail can be seen, adding an intriguing layer of narrative to the image. The interior of the truck door shows signs of wear and tear, with faded and chipped blue paint, hinting at its age and extensive use.

The man appears to be middle-aged with distinct facial features including deep-set eyes and prominent cheekbones, contributing to a rugged expression that seems to reflect a life of experience. He wears a dark denim jacket over a buttoned shirt, fitting for a working environment.

In the background, lush greenery and trees are visible, suggesting that the truck is parked in a rural or semi-rural area during a sunny day, highlighted by the bright, natural light illuminating the scene. The overall composition of the photograph, combining the interior elements of the truck with the external reflections and nature, creates a vivid, storytelling portrait of this individual and his surroundings.
title: Woodrow Wilson, one of Leakey's local characters, in his pickup. He never works, but sits staring at the river on the outskirts of town from 7 a.m. to sunset.
